page.title: 09CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: MANY OF THE GAMES CHILDREN PLAY IN THE PLAYGROUND ARE GAMES THAT HAVE BEEN TAUGHT TO THEM BY OLDER CHILDREN. THESE GAMES HAVE NEVER BEEN WRITTEN DOWN SO THE WORDS CAN OFTEN DIFFER SLIGHTLY FROM GENERATION TO GENERATION. THE CHILDREN USUALLY STAND IN A CIRCLE HOLDING HANDS,THEN THEY MOVE AROUND IN A CLOCKWISE DIRECTION CHANTING THE WORDS AS THEY MOVE AROUND.MANY OF THE GAMES HAVE AN HISTORICAL THEME, SUCH AS RING A RING O ROSES AND LONDON BRIDGE IS BURNING DOWN. THIS TYPE OF GAME WAS ONCE VERY POPULAR BUT NOW THEY ARE DYING OUT BECAUSE CHILDREN HAVE MANY MORE THINGS TO OCCUPY THEM SUCH AS TELEVISION AND COMPUTERS.IF A GENERATION OF CHILDREN DO NOT LEARN THESE GAMES THEN THEY WILL BE LOST FOREVER WHICH WILL BE VERY SAD.
